body: You gain a +2 armor bonus to your Armor Class for 10 minutes; this bonus increases by +1 for every 5 caster levels (maximum +6 at 20th level). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence bonus.
name: Iron Skin
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Wizard/Elemental Wizard Schools/Metal/Iron Skin
